taskbody.prereq: Embedded server must be already created through a template (i.e., server-pms or server-cdm) and available in the Server view pane.

step.cmd: To start the Embedded server, select the Embedded Server ([server name]) on [port number] line in the Server view pane and click on the Start icon located at the right side of the toolbar view.
step.stepresult: Design Studio first stops the server if it was running and then restarts it. It opens the Console view pane displaying the logs. The server is started when the line Embedded Server is now up and running at: http://localhost:[port number]/wui/ and the embedded server status in the Server view pane has changed to "started".

step.cmd: Click on the given URL to open your browser on the running application http://localhost:8080/wui/.
To stop the Embedded server, select the Embedded Server ([server name]) on [port number] line in the Server view pane and click on the Stop icon located at the right side of the toolbar view.
step.stepresult: The embedded server status in the Server view pane has changed to "stopped".
